text:
🚨 This is huge!
@USouthFlorida researchers studied 682,933 patients’ hospitalization due to #cancer #pain, of which 4,254 had history of #cannabis abuse.
Cannabis use paradoxically ⬇️ the risk of in-hospital mortality (OR 0.69).
#ASRASpring19 abstract. 
#MedicalCannabis https://t.co/RpQevOo7BR
